name: Acid Moon
summary:
Acid Moon is an exciting 3D role play game - action - adventure. 
 
On the planet Acid Moon, in a far galaxy, you slip into the role of the agent Angel, which works for the government there. 
A company named ARGUSA exploit the planet and the workers merciless. 
With the time the discontent among the workers, the so-called Retros, in the silos germinates. 
 
A small group of Retros unites to a group of resistances, which calls red Space, unrest donates and incites the workers! 
Perhaps does it give a traitor with ARGUSA or does put nevertheless somebody else behind? 
This is now the time, where your boss counts on you. 
Its your task to sought out the resistances and put to them the handicraft, before they infiltrate the whole system on Acid Moon. 
Solve the secrets on Acid Moon and be calm on surprises!
